column4: if my keyring and login passwords are the same, why is it that I have to enter both of them every time I log in?
but I read a few places that if the passwords were the same, gnome would automatically enter the keyring password for you
that would defeat the purpose of the keyring
that's what I thought, I just saw a few people in the forums claiming that's what happened.  I guess I'll stick with the annoyance for the added security
